pageSubtitle: EcoHub Kosova is the digital marketplace and green partner network connecting businesses, recyclers and NGOs for real circular economy solutions.

discover.title: Discover green offers & requests
discover.body: Browse listings for recyclable materials, green services and circular products from all over Kosovo.

connect.title: Connect with eco partners
connect.body: Reach out directly to recyclers, service providers and NGOs to start concrete collaborations.

closeLoop.title: Close the loop
closeLoop.body: Turn waste into resources, sign long-term agreements and help build a circular economy in Kosovo.

business.title: Businesses & recyclers
business.body: List your surplus materials, services or needs and find reliable partners to process, buy or supply.

ngo.title: NGOs & initiatives
ngo.body: Promote your environmental projects, join campaigns and support local circular solutions.
